trans-unit.source: This would allow an attacker to configure the system identity scope with certificates that should not be trusted, thereby granting applet or application code signed with those certificates privileges that would have been denied by the system's original identity scope.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许攻击者用不应被信任的证书来配置系统身份范围,从而授予用这些证书签署的小程序或应用程序代码特权,而这些特权本来会被系统的原始身份范围所拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This would allow an attacker to replace somebody else's (the "target's") keypair with a possibly weaker keypair (e.g., a keypair of a smaller keysize). This also would allow the attacker to listen in on encrypted communication between the target and its peers. The target's peers might wrap an encryption session key under the target's "new" public key, which would allow the attacker (who possesses the corresponding private key) to unwrap the session key and decipher the communication data encrypted under that session key.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许攻击者用可能较弱的密钥对(例如密钥大小较小的密钥对)替换别人("目标 "的)的密钥对。这也允许攻击者监听目标与其对等体之间的加密通信。目标的对等体可能会在目标的 "新 "公开密钥下包裹一个加密会话密钥,这将允许攻击者(拥有相应的私人密钥)解开会话密钥,并破译在该会话密钥下加密的通信数据。

trans-unit.source: This would allow code to read the particular file associated with the file descriptor read. This is dangerous if the file contains confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许代码读取与读取的文件描述符相关的特定文件。如果文件中包含机密数据,这是很危险的。

trans-unit.source: This would allow code to read the value, or determine the existence, of a particular environment variable. This is dangerous if the variable contains confidential data.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许代码读取特定环境变量的值,或确定其存在。如果该变量包含机密数据,这是很危险的。

trans-unit.source: This would allow malfeasant code to share potentially sensitive or confidential information.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许不法代码分享潜在的敏感或机密信息。

trans-unit.source: This would allow malicious code to add tray icons to the system tray. First, such an icon may look like the icon of some known application (such as a firewall or anti-virus) and order a user to do something unsafe (with help of balloon messages). Second, the system tray may be glutted with tray icons so that no one could add a tray icon anymore.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许恶意代码在系统托盘中添加托盘图标。首先,这样的图标可能看起来像一些已知的应用程序(如防火墙或反病毒)的图标,并命令用户做一些不安全的事情(借助气球信息)。第二,系统托盘可能会充斥着托盘图标,这样就没有人可以再添加一个托盘图标了。

trans-unit.source: This would allow somebody to introduce a possibly malicious provider (e.g., one that discloses the private keys passed to it) as the highest-priority provider. This would be possible because the Security object (which manages the installed providers) currently does not check the integrity or authenticity of a provider before attaching it.
trans-unit.target: 这将允许某人引入一个可能是恶意的提供者(例如,披露传递给它的私钥的提供者)作为最高优先级的提供者。这样做是可能的,因为安全对象(管理已安装的提供者)目前在附加提供者之前并不检查其完整性或真实性。

trans-unit.source: This would allow somebody to introduce a possibly malicious provider (e.g., one that discloses the private keys passed to it) as the highest-priority provider. This would be possible because the Security object (which manages the installed providers) currently does not check the integrity or authenticity of a provider before attaching it. The "insertProvider" permission subsumes the "insertProvider.{provider name}" permission (see the section below for more information).
trans-unit.target: 这将允许某人引入一个可能是恶意的提供者(例如,披露传递给它的私钥的提供者)作为最高优先级的提供者。这将是可能的,因为安全对象(管理已安装的提供者)目前在附加提供者之前并不检查提供者的完整性或真实性。"insertProvider "权限从属于 "insertProvider.{提供者名称}"权限(更多信息请参见下节)。

trans-unit.source: This would correspond to the following inner class implementation:
trans-unit.target: 这将对应于下面的内类实现。

trans-unit.source: This would grant an attacker permission to get the class loader for a particular class. This is dangerous because having access to a class's class loader allows the attacker to load other classes available to that class loader. The attacker would typically otherwise not have access to those classes.
trans-unit.target: 这将授予攻击者获取某个类的类加载器的权限。这是很危险的,因为拥有对一个类的类加载器的访问权限,可以让攻击者加载该类加载器可用的其他类。否则,攻击者通常无法访问这些类。

trans-unit.source: This writeReplace method is invoked by serialization if the method exists and it would be accessible from a method defined within the class of the object being serialized. Thus, the method can have private, protected and package-private access. Subclass access to this method follows java accessibility rules.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个writeReplace方法存在,并且它可以从被序列化对象的类中定义的方法访问,那么这个writeReplace方法就会被序列化调用。因此,该方法可以有私有、保护和包私有的访问权限。子类对该方法的访问遵循java的可访问性规则。

trans-unit.source: Though null is a valid name, when getAttributes(null) is invoked on a Manifest obtained from a jar file, null will be returned. While jar files themselves do not allow null-named attributes, it is possible to invoke getEntries() on a Manifest, and on that result, invoke put with a null key and an arbitrary value. Subsequent invocations of getAttributes(null) will return the just-put value.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 null 是有效 name ，但是对从jar文件获取的 Manifest 调用 getAttributes(null) 时，将返回 null 。尽管jar文件本身不允许使用以 null 命名的属性，但可以在 Manifest 上调用 getEntries() ，并在该结果上使用null键和任意值调用 put 。后续调用 getAttributes(null) 将返回只是- put 价值。

trans-unit.source: Though null is a valid name, when getAttributes(null) is invoked on a Manifest obtained from a jar file, null will be returned. While jar files themselves do not allow null-named attributes, it is possible to invoke getEntries() on a Manifest, and on that result, invoke put with a null key and an arbitrary value. Subsequent invocations of getAttributes(null) will return the just-put value.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 null 是有效 name ，但对从jar文件获取的 Manifest 调用 getAttributes(null) 时，将返回 null 。尽管jar文件本身不允许使用以 null 命名的属性，但可以在 Manifest 上调用 getEntries() ，并在该结果上使用null键和任意值调用 put 。后续调用 getAttributes(null) 将返回只是- put 价值。

trans-unit.source: Though it may be tempting to do so, avoid testing if an object is empty by comparing with == against instances returned by Option.empty(). There is no guarantee that it is a singleton. Instead, use isPresent().
trans-unit.target: 尽管这样做可能很诱人，但应通过将 == 与 Option.empty() 返回的实例进行比较来避免测试对象是否为空。不能保证它是一个单例。而是使用 isPresent() 。

trans-unit.source: Thread ID is a positive long value returned by calling the Thread.getId() method for a thread. The thread ID is unique during its lifetime. When a thread is terminated, this thread ID may be reused.
trans-unit.target: 线程ID是通过为线程调用 Thread.getId() 方法返回的长整数正值。线程ID在其生存期内是唯一的。当线程终止时，可以重新使用该线程ID。

trans-unit.source: Thread ID is a positive long value returned by calling the Thread.getId() method for a thread. The thread ID is unique during its lifetime. When a thread is terminated, this thread ID may be reused.

trans-unit.target: 线程正在等待一个java监视器

trans-unit.source: Thread pools address two different problems: they usually provide improved performance when executing large numbers of asynchronous tasks, due to reduced per-task invocation overhead, and they provide a means of bounding and managing the resources, including threads, consumed when executing a collection of tasks. Each ThreadPoolExecutor also maintains some basic statistics, such as the number of completed tasks.
trans-unit.target: 线程池解决了两个不同的问题：由于减少了每个任务的调用开销，它们通常在执行大量异步任务时可提供改进的性能，并且它们提供了一种绑定和管理资源（包括线程）的方法，这些资源在执行一个集合时消耗任务。每个 ThreadPoolExecutor 还维护一些基本统计信息，例如已完成任务的数量。

trans-unit.source: Thread state for a runnable thread. A thread in the runnable state is executing in the Java virtual machine but it may be waiting for other resources from the operating system such as processor.
trans-unit.target: 一个可运行线程的线程状态。处于可运行状态的线程在Java虚拟机中执行,但它可能正在等待操作系统的其他资源,如处理器。

trans-unit.source: Thread state for a thread blocked waiting for a monitor lock. A thread in the blocked state is waiting for a monitor lock to enter a synchronized block/method or reenter a synchronized block/method after calling Object.wait.
trans-unit.target: 线程的线程状态被阻塞，等待监视器锁定。处于阻塞状态的线程在调用 Object.wait 之后正在等待监视器锁定输入同步的块/方法或重新输入同步的块/方法。

trans-unit.source: Threads need not be suspended.

trans-unit.source: Threads running in the mirrored VM are abruptly terminated. A thread death exception is not thrown and finally blocks are not run.
trans-unit.target: 在镜像虚拟机中运行的线程会突然终止。不抛出线程死亡异常,最后不运行块。

trans-unit.source: Three digits for the day-of-year. This is pre-padded by zero to ensure three digits.

trans-unit.source: Three letter day-of-week in English.
trans-unit.target: day-of-week 三封英文信。

trans-unit.source: Three letter month-of-year in English.
trans-unit.target: 英文 month-of-year 三个字母。

trans-unit.source: Three methods on a TextLayout object (getNextRightHit, getNextLeftHit, and hitTestChar) return instances of TextHitInfo. The offsets contained in these TextHitInfo objects are relative to the start of the TextLayout, not to the text used to create the TextLayout. Similarly, TextLayout methods that accept TextHitInfo instances as parameters expect the TextHitInfo object's offsets to be relative to the TextLayout, not to any underlying text storage model.
trans-unit.target: TextLayout 对象上的三个方法（ getNextRightHit ， getNextLeftHit 和 hitTestChar ）返回 TextHitInfo 的实例。这些 TextHitInfo 对象中包含的偏移量是相对于 TextLayout 的开始的，而不是相对于用于创建 TextLayout 的文本的。同样，接受 TextHitInfo 实例作为参数的 TextLayout 方法期望 TextHitInfo 对象的偏移量相对于 TextLayout ，而不是相对于任何基础文本存储模型的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Three sample Configurations are shown below. The first one activates search-first mode. It identifies the LDAP server and specifies that users' entries be located by their uid and objectClass attributes. It also specifies that an identity based on the user's employeeNumber attribute should be created. The second one activates authentication-first mode. It requests that the LDAP server be located dynamically, that authentication be performed using the supplied username directly but without the protection of SSL and that users' entries be located by one of three naming attributes and their objectClass attribute. The third one activates authentication-only mode. It identifies alternative LDAP servers, it specifies the distinguished name to use for authentication and a fixed identity to use for authorization. No directory search is performed.
trans-unit.target: 下面显示了三个示例 Configuration 。第一个激活搜索优先模式。它标识LDAP服务器，并通过其 uid 和 objectClass 属性指定用户的条目。它还指定应创建基于用户的 employeeNumber 属性的身份。第二个激活认证优先模式。它要求动态定位LDAP服务器，直接使用提供的用户名执行身份验证，但不使用SSL保护，并通过三个命名属性及其 objectClass 之一定位用户的条目属性。第三个激活仅身份验证模式。它标识替代的LDAP服务器，它指定用于身份验证的专有名称和用于授权的固定身份。不执行目录搜索。

trans-unit.source: Three-letter language/country(region) codes
trans-unit.target: 三字母语言/国家(地区)代码

trans-unit.source: Three-letter time zone IDs
trans-unit.target: 三个字母的时区ID

trans-unit.source: Threshold
trans-unit.target: Threshold

trans-unit.source: Through methods of the Line interface, which Mixer extends, a mixer might provide a set of controls that are global to the mixer. For example, the mixer can have a master gain control. These global controls are distinct from the controls belonging to each of the mixer's individual lines.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Mixer 扩展的 Line 接口的方法，混合器可以提供一组对于混合器全局的控件。例如，混频器可以具有主增益控制。这些全局控件与属于混音器各行的控件不同。

trans-unit.source: Throughout this specification, a "non-exported package" refers to a package that is not exported to all modules, and a "non-open package" refers to a package that is not open to all modules. Specifically, these terms refer to a package that either is not exported/open by its containing module or is exported/open in a qualified fashion by its containing module.
trans-unit.target: 在本规范中,"非导出包 "指的是没有导出到所有模块的包,"非开放包 "指的是没有对所有模块开放的包。具体来说,这些术语指的是一个包,要么不被其包含的模块导出/开放,要么被其包含的模块以限定的方式导出/开放。

trans-unit.source: Throughput and scalability are generally highest for the default barging (also known as greedy, renouncement, and convoy-avoidance) strategy. While this is not guaranteed to be fair or starvation-free, earlier queued threads are allowed to recontend before later queued threads, and each recontention has an unbiased chance to succeed against incoming threads. Also, while acquires do not "spin" in the usual sense, they may perform multiple invocations of tryAcquire interspersed with other computations before blocking. This gives most of the benefits of spins when exclusive synchronization is only briefly held, without most of the liabilities when it isn't. If so desired, you can augment this by preceding calls to acquire methods with "fast-path" checks, possibly prechecking hasContended() and/or hasQueuedThreads() to only do so if the synchronizer is likely not to be contended.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认插入（也称为greedy，retouncement和convoy-avoidance）策略，吞吐量和可伸缩性通常最高。尽管不能保证这是公平的，也可以避免饥饿，但允许在较早排队的线程之前重新竞争较早排队的线程，并且每个重新争用都具有无偏向地成功抵御传入线程的机会。此外，尽管通常情况下获取不“旋转”，但它们可能会多次调用 tryAcquire 在阻塞之前散布其他计算。当仅短暂地保持排他同步时，这将提供旋转的大部分好处，而在不进行排他同步时，则不会带来很多负担。如果需要的话，可以通过在调用之前使用“快速路径”检查来获取方法来增强此功能，并可能预先检查 hasContended() 和/或 hasQueuedThreads() 以仅在可能不争用同步器的情况下这样做。

trans-unit.source: Throughput and scalability are generally highest for the default barging (also known as greedy, renouncement, and convoy-avoidance) strategy. While this is not guaranteed to be fair or starvation-free, earlier queued threads are allowed to recontend before later queued threads, and each recontention has an unbiased chance to succeed against incoming threads. Also, while acquires do not "spin" in the usual sense, they may perform multiple invocations of tryAcquire interspersed with other computations before blocking. This gives most of the benefits of spins when exclusive synchronization is only briefly held, without most of the liabilities when it isn't. If so desired, you can augment this by preceding calls to acquire methods with "fast-path" checks, possibly prechecking hasContended() and/or hasQueuedThreads() to only do so if the synchronizer is likely not to be contended.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认插入（也称为greedy，retouncement和convoy-avoidance）策略，吞吐量和可伸缩性通常最高。尽管不能保证这是公平的，也可以避免饥饿，但允许在较早排队的线程在较晚排队的线程之前进行重新竞争，并且每个重新争用都可以毫无偏向地成功抵御传入线程。另外，尽管通常情况下获取并不会“旋转”，但是它们可能会多次调用 tryAcquire 在阻塞之前散布其他计算。当仅短暂地保持排他同步时，这将提供旋转的大部分好处，而在没有同步时，则不会带来很多负担。如果需要，您可以通过在调用之前对获取方法进行“快速路径”检查来增强此功能，并可能预先检查 hasContended() 和/或 hasQueuedThreads() 以仅在可能不争用同步器的情况下才这样做。

trans-unit.source: Throwing an error in these cases may seem extreme. The rationale for this behavior is that a malformed provider-configuration file, like a malformed class file, indicates a serious problem with the way the Java virtual machine is configured or is being used. As such it is preferable to throw an error rather than try to recover or, even worse, fail silently.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下抛出错误可能看起来很极端。这种行为的基本原理是,一个畸形的提供者-配置文件,就像一个畸形的类文件一样,表明Java虚拟机的配置方式或使用方式存在严重问题。因此,最好是抛出一个错误,而不是试图恢复,甚至更糟糕的是,默默地失败。

trans-unit.source: Thrown at the invocation if the call site can not be linked by any available GuardingDynamicLinker.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用站点无法通过任何可用的 GuardingDynamicLinker 链接，则在调用时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by VirtualMachine.attach when attempting to attach to a Java virtual machine for which a compatible AttachProvider does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 尝试附加到不存在兼容的 AttachProvider 的Java虚拟机时，由 VirtualMachine.attach 抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by VirtualMachine.attach when attempting to attach to a Java virtual machine for which a compatible AttachProvider does not exist. It is also thrown by AttachProvider.attachVirtualMachine if the provider attempts to attach to a Java virtual machine with which it not comptatible.
trans-unit.target: 尝试附加到不存在兼容的 AttachProvider 的Java虚拟机时，由 VirtualMachine.attach 抛出。它也被抛出 AttachProvider.attachVirtualMachine 如果提供商试图连接到一个Java虚拟机与它不comptatible。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 由 String 方法抛出，以指示索引为负数或大于字符串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 由 String 方法抛出，以指示索引为负数或大于字符串的大小。对于某些方法，例如 charAt 方法，当索引等于字符串的大小时，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by String methods to indicate that an index is either negative or greater than the size of the string. For some methods such as the charAt method, this exception also is thrown when the index is equal to the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 由 String 方法抛出，以指示索引为负数或大于字符串的大小。对于某些方法，例如charAt方法，当索引等于字符串的大小时，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a ModuleFinder when an error occurs finding a module.
trans-unit.target: 查找模块发生错误时，被 ModuleFinder 抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a ModuleFinder when an error occurs finding a module. Also thrown by Configuration.resolve when resolution fails for observability-related reasons.
trans-unit.target: 查找模块发生错误时，被 ModuleFinder 抛出。当由于与可观察性相关的原因而导致解析失败时，也会由 Configuration.resolve 引发。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type, or that the token is out of range for the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 由 Scanner 抛出，以指示检索到的令牌与预期类型的​​模式不匹配，或者令牌超出预期类型的​​范围。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a method invocation on a proxy instance if its invocation handler's invoke method throws a checked exception (a Throwable that is not assignable to RuntimeException or Error) that is not assignable to any of the exception types declared in the throws clause of the method that was invoked on the proxy instance and dispatched to the invocation handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果代理实例的方法调用方法调用其调用处理程序的 invoke 方法引发一个检查后的异常（不可分配给 RuntimeException 或 Error 的 Throwable ），则该异常无法分配给该方法的 throws 子句中声明的任何异常类型，则抛出该异常在代理实例上被调用并调度到调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by a method invocation on a proxy instance if its invocation handler's invoke method throws a checked exception (a Throwable that is not assignable to RuntimeException or Error) that is not assignable to any of the exception types declared in the throws clause of the method that was invoked on the proxy instance and dispatched to the invocation handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果代理实例的 invoke 方法的调用方法引发了检查后的异常（不可分配给 RuntimeException 或 Error 的 Throwable ），而该异常无法分配给该方法的 throws 子句中声明的任何异常类型，则由代理实例的方法调用抛出该异常在代理实例上被调用并调度到调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当其输入参数无效时，由 ClassFileTransformer.transform 的实现抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid. This may occur either because the initial class file bytes were invalid or a previously applied transform corrupted the bytes.
trans-unit.target: 当其输入参数无效时，由 ClassFileTransformer.transform 的实现抛出该异常。这可能是由于初始类文件字节无效或先前应用的转换损坏了字节而发生的。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 当其输入参数无效时，由 ClassFileTransformer.transform 的实现抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of ClassFileTransformer.transform when its input parameters are invalid. This may occur either because the initial class file bytes were invalid or a previously applied transform corrupted the bytes.
trans-unit.target: 当其输入参数无效时，由 ClassFileTransformer.transform 的实现抛出该异常。这可能是由于初始类文件字节无效或先前应用的转换损坏了字节而发生的。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of Instrumentation.redefineClasses when one of the specified classes cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 当无法修改指定的类之一时，由 Instrumentation.redefineClasses 的实现抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by an implementation of Instrumentation.redefineClasses when one of the specified classes cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 当无法修改指定的类之一时，由 Instrumentation.redefineClasses 的实现抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by method createFont in the Font class to indicate that the specified font is bad.
trans-unit.target: 由 Font 类中的createFont方法抛出，以指示指定的字体是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by methods in Locale and Locale.Builder to indicate that an argument is not a well-formed BCP 47 tag.
trans-unit.target: 由 Locale 和 Locale.Builder 中的方法抛出，以指示参数不是格式正确的BCP 47标记。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by methods in the Stack class to indicate that the stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: 由 Stack 类中的方法抛出，以指示堆栈为空。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by the security manager to indicate a security violation.
trans-unit.target: 由安全经理抛出,表示有安全违规行为。

trans-unit.source: Thrown by various accessor methods to indicate that the element being requested does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 由各种访问器方法抛出,表示被请求的元素不存在。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application attempts to access or modify a field, or to call a method that it does not have access to.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图访问或修改一个字段,或调用一个它没有访问权限的方法,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to access or modify a specified field of an object, and that object no longer has that field.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图访问或修改一个对象的指定字段,并且该对象不再拥有该字段,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to call a specified method of a class (either static or instance), and that class no longer has a definition of that method.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图调用一个类的指定方法(无论是静态的还是实例的),并且该类不再有该方法的定义,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if an application tries to create an array with negative size.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图创建一个负数组,则抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the Java Virtual Machine cannot find an appropriate native-language definition of a method declared native.
trans-unit.target: 如果Java虚拟机找不到声明为 native 的方法的适当本机语言定义，则抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the Java Virtual Machine or a ClassLoader instance tries to load in the definition of a class (as part of a normal method call or as part of creating a new instance using the new expression) and no definition of the class could be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果Java虚拟机或 ClassLoader 实例尝试加载类的定义（作为常规方法调用的一部分或使用 new 表达式创建新实例的一部分）而抛出，则找不到该类的定义。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate a duplicate event request.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示有重复的事件请求。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate a problem with time-zone configuration.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示时区配置有问题。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate a type mismatch in setting the value of a field or variable, or in specifying the return value of a method.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示在设置字段或变量的值或指定方法的返回值时出现类型不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate an exception occurred in an invoked method within the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示目标虚拟机内的调用方法发生异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate an invalid argument or inconsistent passed to a Connector.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示传递给 Connector 的参数无效或不一致。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate an operation cannot be completed because it is not valid for a native method.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示一个操作不能完成,因为它对本地方法无效。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate line number or variable information is not available.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示行号或变量信息不可用。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate some unexpected internal error has occurred in the Java Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示在Java虚拟机中发生了一些意外的内部错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a HTTP request needs to be retried but cannot be retried automatically, due to streaming mode being enabled.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示一个HTTP请求需要重试,但由于流媒体模式被启用,不能自动重试。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a malformed URL has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示发生了错误的URL。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a malformed URL has occurred. Either no legal protocol could be found in a specification string or the string could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示发生了错误的URL。要么是在规范字符串中找不到合法协议,要么是该字符串无法解析。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a method has been called by an inappropriate caller.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示一个方法被不适当的调用者调用。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a method has been passed an illegal or inappropriate argument.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示一个方法被传递了一个非法或不适当的参数。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a module cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示不能修改模块。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a preferences operation could not complete because of a failure in the backing store, or a failure to contact the backing store.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示由于后盾存储失败或无法联系后盾存储,导致偏好操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation type that was added to the annotation type definition after the annotation was compiled (or serialized).
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示程序试图访问注释类型的元素,该元素在注释编译(或序列化)后被添加到注释类型定义中。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation type that was added to the annotation type definition after the annotation was compiled (or serialized). This exception will not be thrown if the new element has a default value. This exception can be thrown by the API used to read annotations reflectively.
trans-unit.target: 引发以指示程序在编译（或序列化）注释后尝试访问添加到注释类型定义中的注释类型的元素。如果新元素具有默认值，则不会引发此异常。用于反射性地读取注释的API可以引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation whose type has changed after the annotation was compiled (or serialized).
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示程序试图访问在注释编译(或序列化)后类型已改变的注释元素。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a program has attempted to access an element of an annotation whose type has changed after the annotation was compiled (or serialized). This exception can be thrown by the API used to read annotations reflectively.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示程序尝试访问注释的元素，该元素的类型在编译（或序列化）注释后已更改。用于反射性地读取注释的API可以引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a thread has attempted to wait on an object's monitor or to notify other threads waiting on an object's monitor without owning the specified monitor.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示一个线程已经尝试在对象的监视器上等待,或者通知其他线程在没有拥有指定监视器的情况下在对象的监视器上等待。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a thread is not in an appropriate state for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示线程不在请求操作的适当状态。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that a thread is not in an appropriate state for the requested operation. See, for example, the suspend and resume methods in class Thread.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示线程未处于所请求操作的适当状态。例如，参见 Thread 类中的 suspend 和 resume 方法。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an invokedynamic instruction has failed to find its bootstrap method, or the bootstrap method has failed to provide a call site with a target of the correct method type.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示 invokedynamic 指令未能找到其bootstrap方法，或者bootstrap方法未能为调用站点提供正确方法类型的目标。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an invokedynamic instruction or a dynamic constant failed to resolve its bootstrap method and arguments, or for invokedynamic instruction the bootstrap method has failed to provide a call site with a target of the correct method type, or for a dynamic constant the bootstrap method has failed to provide a constant value of the required type.
trans-unit.target: 抛出，表明一个 invokedynamic 指令或动态常数未能解决其引导方法和参数，或为 invokedynamic 指令的引导方法未能提供一个调用点与目标正确的方法类型，或动态不断引导方法无法提供所需类型的常量值。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示一个数组被非法索引访问。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index. The index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the array.
trans-unit.target: 抛出该函数,表示一个数组被非法索引访问。索引为负数,或者大于或等于数组的大小。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an assertion has failed.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示断言失败。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to store the wrong type of object into an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示试图将错误类型的对象存储到对象数组中。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an attempt has been made to store the wrong type of object into an array of objects. For example, the following code generates an ArrayStoreException:
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常表示试图将错误类型的对象存储到对象数组中。例如，以下代码生成 ArrayStoreException ：

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an index of some sort (such as to an array, to a string, or to a vector) is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示某个索引(如数组、字符串或向量)超出了范围。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an operation could not complete because the input did not conform to the appropriate XML document type for a collection of preferences, as per the Preferences specification.
trans-unit.target: 根据“ Preferences 规范，抛出该异常以指示操作无法完成，因为输入不符合首选项集合的相应XML文档类型。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an operation could not complete because the input did not conform to the appropriate XML document type for a collection of properties, as per the Properties specification.
trans-unit.target: 根据 Properties 规范，抛出该错误以指示操作无法完成，因为输入不符合用于属性集合的适当XML文档类型。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an unexpected internal error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示发生了意外的内部错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an unknown service exception has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示发生了一个未知的服务异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that an unknown service exception has occurred. Either the MIME type returned by a URL connection does not make sense, or the application is attempting to write to a read-only URL connection.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示发生了一个未知的服务异常。要么是URL连接返回的MIME类型没有意义,要么是应用程序正试图写入一个只读的URL连接。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that code has attempted to call a method handle via the wrong method type.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示代码试图通过错误的方法类型调用一个方法句柄。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that code has attempted to call a method handle via the wrong method type. As with the bytecode representation of normal Java method calls, method handle calls are strongly typed to a specific type descriptor associated with a call site.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示代码试图通过错误的方法类型调用一个方法句柄。与普通Java方法调用的字节码表示方式一样,方法句柄调用被强烈地类型化为与调用站点相关联的特定类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the clone method in class Object has been called to clone an object, but that the object's class does not implement the Cloneable interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示已调用 Object 类中的 clone 方法来克隆对象，但该对象的类未实现 Cloneable 接口。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the IP address of a host could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示无法确定主机的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the Java Virtual Machine is broken or has run out of resources necessary for it to continue operating.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示Java虚拟机已损坏或已耗尽继续运行所需的资源。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a string to one of the numeric types, but that the string does not have the appropriate format.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示应用程序已尝试将字符串转换为数字类型之一,但该字符串没有适当的格式。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the code has attempted to cast an object to a subclass of which it is not an instance.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示代码试图将一个对象投向一个它不是实例的子类。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the code has attempted to cast an object to a subclass of which it is not an instance. For example, the following code generates a ClassCastException:
trans-unit.target: 抛出该异常以指示代码已尝试将对象强制转换为不是实例的子类。例如，以下代码生成 ClassCastException ：

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the operation is invalid because it would modify the VM and the VM is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示操作无效,因为它会修改虚拟机,而虚拟机是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the operation is invalid because it would modify the VM and the VM is read-only. See VirtualMachine.canBeModified().
trans-unit.target: 抛出该错误指示该操作无效，因为它会修改VM，并且VM是只读的。参见 VirtualMachine.canBeModified() 。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested class has not yet been loaded through the appropriate class loader.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示所请求的类还没有通过相应的类加载器加载。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested event cannot be modified because it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示所请求的事件不能被修改,因为它已被启用。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested event cannot be modified because it is enabled. Filters can be added only to disabled event requests. Also thrown if an operation is attempted on a deleted request. See EventRequestManager.deleteEventRequest(EventRequest)
trans-unit.target: 抛出该消息以指示所请求的事件已启用，因此无法修改。过滤器只能添加到禁用的事件请求中。如果尝试对已删除的请求执行操作，也会抛出该错误。请参阅 EventRequestManager.deleteEventRequest(EventRequest)

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested module is invalid or became invalid after the module was unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示所请求的模块无效或在模块卸载后无效。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the a mirror from one target VM is being combined with a mirror from another target VM.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示请求的操作无法完成,因为一个目标虚拟机的镜像正在与另一个目标虚拟机的镜像合并。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the specified class has not yet been prepared.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示由于指定的类尚未准备好,所以不能完成所请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the specified code index is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示由于指定的代码索引无效而无法完成请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the specified line number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示由于指定的行号无效而无法完成所请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the specified object has been garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示由于指定的对象已经被垃圾回收,所以请求的操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the specified stack frame is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 抛出,表示由于指定的堆栈框架不再有效,所以不能完成请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed because the target VM has run out of memory.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示由于目标虚拟机已耗尽内存而无法完成请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be completed while the specified thread is in its current state.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示当指定线程处于当前状态时,请求的操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation cannot be performed because the set is unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示由于该集合不可修改而无法执行请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that the requested operation is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示不支持所请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that there is an error creating or accessing a Socket.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示在创建或访问Socket时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that there is an error in the underlying protocol, such as a TCP error.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示底层协议有错误,如TCP错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that there is an inconistency in the debug information provided by the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 抛出表示目标虚拟机提供的调试信息存在不一致。

trans-unit.source: Thrown to indicate that there is an inconistency in the debug information provided by the target VM. For example, this exception is thrown if there is a type mismatch between a retrieved value's runtime type and its declared type as reported by the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 抛出此异常,表示目标 VM 提供的调试信息不一致。例如,如果检索到的值的运行时类型与目标虚拟机报告的声明类型之间存在类型不匹配,则抛出此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the java.lang.reflect package attempts to read method parameters from a class file and determines that one or more parameters are malformed.
trans-unit.target: 当 the java.lang.reflect package 尝试从类文件中读取方法参数并确定一个或多个参数格式错误时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the java.lang.reflect package attempts to read method parameters from a class file and determines that one or more parameters are malformed.
trans-unit.target: 当 the java.lang.reflect package 尝试从类文件中读取方法参数并确定一个或多个参数格式错误时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when Java language access checks cannot be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 当Java语言访问检查不能被抑制时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a connection, over which an HttpRequest is intended to be sent, is not successfully established within a specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的时间段内未成功建立打算通过其发送 HttpRequest 的连接时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a file system operation fails on one or two files.
trans-unit.target: 当一个文件系统操作在一个或两个文件上失败时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a file system operation fails on one or two files. This class is the general class for file system exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 当文件系统操作在一个或两个文件上失败时抛出。该类是文件系统异常的一般类。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a particular method cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 当找不到特定方法时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Parser Factories exists.
trans-unit.target: 当Parser Factories的配置存在问题时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Parser Factories exists. This error will typically be thrown when the class of a parser factory specified in the system properties cannot be found or instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 当解析器工厂的配置存在问题时,抛出该错误。当找不到或无法实例化系统属性中指定的解析器工厂类时,通常会抛出该错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Schema Factories exists.
trans-unit.target: 当Schema Factories的配置存在问题时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Schema Factories exists. This error will typically be thrown when the class of a schema factory specified in the system properties cannot be found or instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 当模式工厂的配置存在问题时抛出。当系统属性中指定的模式工厂的类无法找到或实例化时,通常会抛出该错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Transformer Factories exists.
trans-unit.target: 当与变压器厂的配置存在问题时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Transformer Factories exists. This error will typically be thrown when the class of a transformation factory specified in the system properties cannot be found or instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 当变形工厂的配置存在问题时抛出。当系统属性中指定的变形工厂的类无法找到或实例化时,通常会抛出此错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a response is not received within a specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 在指定时间内未收到响应时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a semantically malformed parameterized type is encountered by a reflective method that needs to instantiate it.
trans-unit.target: 当需要实例化的反射方法遇到一个语义错误的参数化类型时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a semantically malformed parameterized type is encountered by a reflective method that needs to instantiate it. For example, if the number of type arguments to a parameterized type is wrong.
trans-unit.target: 当需要实例化它的反射方法遇到一个语义错误的参数化类型时,抛出该语句。例如,如果参数化类型的类型参数数量错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a serious Abstract Window Toolkit error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 当发生严重的Abstract Window Toolkit错误时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a serious I/O error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 当发生严重的I/O错误时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a stack overflow occurs because an application recurses too deeply.
trans-unit.target: 当由于应用程序递归过深而发生堆栈溢出时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a syntactically malformed signature attribute is encountered by a reflective method that needs to interpret the generic signature information for a type, method or constructor.
trans-unit.target: 当需要解释类型、方法或构造函数的通用签名信息的反射方法遇到语法错误的签名属性时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity.
trans-unit.target: 当一个线程在等待、睡眠或以其他方式被占用,并且该线程在活动之前或活动期间被中断时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity. Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:
trans-unit.target: 当线程正在等待、睡眠或以其他方式被占用,并且该线程在活动之前或活动期间被中断时,抛出该异常。偶尔一个方法可能希望测试当前线程是否被中断,如果是,则立即抛出这个异常。可以使用下面的代码来实现这个效果。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an UndoableEdit is told to redo() and can't.
trans-unit.target: 当告诉UndoableEdit redo() 并且不能这样做时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an UndoableEdit is told to undo() and can't.
trans-unit.target: 当UndoableEdit被告知执行 undo() 而不能执行时，抛出该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to access a sequence of Class objects each corresponding to a TypeMirror.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试访问每个对应于 TypeMirror 的 Class 对象序列时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to access a sequence of Class objects each corresponding to a TypeMirror.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试访问每个对应于 TypeMirror 的 Class 对象序列时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to access the Class object corresponding to a TypeMirror.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试访问与 TypeMirror 对应的 Class 对象时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to access the Class object corresponding to a TypeMirror.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试访问与 TypeMirror 对应的 Class 对象时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序在需要对象的情况下尝试使用 null 时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required. These include:
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序在需要对象的情况下尝试使用 null 时抛出。这些包括：

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access a type using a string representing the type's name, but no definition for the type with the specified name can be found.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图使用代表类型名称的字符串访问类型,但没有找到指定名称的类型定义时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access a type using a string representing the type's name, but no definition for the type with the specified name can be found. This exception differs from ClassNotFoundException in that ClassNotFoundException is a checked exception, whereas this exception is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用表示类型名称的字符串访问类型时抛出，但是找不到具有指定名称的类型的定义。此异常与 ClassNotFoundException 的不同之处在于， ClassNotFoundException 是已检查的异常，而此异常是未检查的。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access an enum constant by name and the enum type contains no constant with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图通过名称访问一个枚举常量,而枚举类型不包含指定名称的常量时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to access an enum constant by name and the enum type contains no constant with the specified name. This exception can be thrown by the API used to read annotations reflectively.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试按名称访问枚举常量并且枚举类型不包含具有指定名称的常量时，抛出该异常。用于反射性地读取注释的API可以引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to call an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图调用一个抽象方法时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to call an abstract method. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can only occur at run time if the definition of some class has incompatibly changed since the currently executing method was last compiled.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图调用一个抽象方法时抛出。通常情况下,这个错误会被编译器捕获;只有在当前执行的方法最后一次编译后,某些类的定义发生了不兼容的变化时,才会在运行时发生这个错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to create an instance of a class using the newInstance method in class Class, but the specified class object cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用 Class 类中的 newInstance 方法创建类的实例时抛出，但是无法实例化指定的类对象。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to create an instance of a class using the newInstance method in class Class, but the specified class object cannot be instantiated. The instantiation can fail for a variety of reasons including but not limited to:
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用 Class 类中的 newInstance 方法创建类的实例时抛出，但是无法实例化指定的类对象。实例化可能由于多种原因而失败，包括但不限于：

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to load in a class through its string name using:
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图通过其字符串名称加载一个类时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to load in a class through its string name using: The forName method in class Class.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用以下方式通过其字符串名称加载类时，抛出该错误：类 Class 中的 forName 方法。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an application tries to use the Java new construct to instantiate an abstract class or an interface.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序尝试使用Java new 构造实例化抽象类或接口时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an attempt is made to apply either of the following: A subquery expression to an MBean or a qualified attribute expression to an MBean of the wrong class.
trans-unit.target: 当试图应用以下任何一种情况时抛出。将子查询表达式应用于MBean或将限定属性表达式应用于错误类的MBean。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an attempt is made to apply either of the following: A subquery expression to an MBean or a qualified attribute expression to an MBean of the wrong class. This exception is used internally by JMX during the evaluation of a query. User code does not usually see it.
trans-unit.target: 当试图应用以下任何一种情况时抛出。将子查询表达式应用于MBean,或将限定属性表达式应用于错误类的MBean。这个异常由JMX在评估查询时在内部使用。用户代码通常不会看到它。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exception happens during Introspection.
trans-unit.target: 当自省过程中发生异常时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exception is raised in the JavaScript engine.
trans-unit.target: 当JavaScript引擎中出现异常时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exception is raised in the JavaScript engine. This is merely a marker class to indicate an exception relating to the JavaScript interface.
trans-unit.target: 当JavaScript引擎中出现异常时抛出。这只是一个标记类,用来表示与JavaScript接口有关的异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exceptional arithmetic condition has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 当发生特殊运算条件时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exceptional arithmetic condition has occurred. For example, an integer "divide by zero" throws an instance of this class. ArithmeticException objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable.
trans-unit.target: 在发生异常算术条件时抛出。例如，整数“被零除”将引发此类的实例。虚拟机可以构造 ArithmeticException 对象，就像禁用抑制和/或堆栈跟踪不可写一样。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an exceptional arithmetic condition has occurred. For example, an integer "divide by zero" throws an instance of this class. ArithmeticException objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable.
trans-unit.target: 在发生异常算术条件时抛出。例如，整数“除以零”将引发此类的实例。虚拟机可以构造 ArithmeticException 对象，就像禁用抑制和/或堆栈跟踪不可写一样。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an incompatible class change has occurred to some class definition.
trans-unit.target: 当某个类定义发生了不兼容的类变化时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an incompatible class change has occurred to some class definition. The definition of some class, on which the currently executing method depends, has since changed.
trans-unit.target: 当某个类的定义发生了不兼容的类变化时,抛出该函数。当前正在执行的方法所依赖的某个类的定义发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an instance is required to have a Serializable interface.
trans-unit.target: 当一个实例需要有Serializable接口时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an instance is required to have a Serializable interface. The serialization runtime or the class of the instance can throw this exception. The argument should be the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: 当一个实例被要求具有Serializable接口时,就会抛出这个异常。序列化运行时或实例的类可以抛出这个异常。参数应该是类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an invalid MBean attribute is passed to a query constructing method.
trans-unit.target: 当一个无效的MBean属性被传递给查询构造方法时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an invalid MBean attribute is passed to a query constructing method. This exception is used internally by JMX during the evaluation of a query. User code does not usually see it.
trans-unit.target: 当一个无效的MBean属性被传递给查询构造方法时,会被抛出。这个异常在JMX内部评估查询时使用。用户代码通常不会看到它。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an invalid expression is passed to a method for constructing a query.
trans-unit.target: 当一个无效的表达式被传递给构造查询的方法时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an invalid expression is passed to a method for constructing a query. This exception is used internally by JMX during the evaluation of a query. User code does not usually see it.
trans-unit.target: 当一个无效的表达式被传递给构造查询的方法时,会被抛出。这个异常在JMX内部评估查询时使用。用户代码通常不会看到这个异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an invalid string operation is passed to a method for constructing a query.
trans-unit.target: 当一个无效的字符串操作被传递给一个构造查询的方法时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when an unknown but serious exception has occurred in the Java Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机发生未知但严重的异常时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when code that is dependent on a keyboard, display, or mouse is called in an environment that does not support a keyboard, display, or mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当依赖键盘、显示器或鼠标的代码在不支持键盘、显示器或鼠标的环境中被调用时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when code that is dependent on a keyboard, display, or mouse is called in an environment that does not support a keyboard, display, or mouse. Any code that depends on any of those devices should firstly ensure their availability using the GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() method and throw HeadlessException if the latter returns true.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持键盘，显示器或鼠标的环境中调用依赖于键盘，显示器或鼠标的代码时抛出。任何依赖于任何这些设备的代码都应首先使用 GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() 方法确保其可用性，如果后者返回 true ，则抛出 HeadlessException 。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when control information that was read from an object stream violates internal consistency checks.
trans-unit.target: 当从对象流读取的控制信息违反内部一致性检查时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when creating a module layer fails.
trans-unit.target: 创建模块层时抛出失败。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when reading a module descriptor and the module descriptor is found to be malformed or otherwise cannot be interpreted as a module descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 抛出:当读取模块描述符时,发现模块描述符畸形或不能被解释为模块描述符。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when resolving a set of modules, or resolving a set of modules with service binding, fails.
trans-unit.target: 当解析一组模块,或解析一组具有服务绑定的模块失败时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when serialization or deserialization is not active.
trans-unit.target: 当序列化或反序列化未激活时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the "verifier" detects that a class file, though well formed, contains some sort of internal inconsistency or security problem.
trans-unit.target: 当 "验证者 "检测到一个类文件,虽然形成良好,但包含某种内部不一致或安全问题时,抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine attempts to read a class file and determines that the file is malformed or otherwise cannot be interpreted as a class file.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机试图读取一个类文件,并确定该文件是畸形的或不能被解释为类文件时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine attempts to read a class file and determines that the major and minor version numbers in the file are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机试图读取一个类文件并确定文件中的主要和次要版本号不被支持时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine cannot allocate an object because it is out of memory, and no more memory could be made available by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机因为内存不足而无法分配对象时抛出,垃圾收集器无法提供更多的内存。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine cannot allocate an object because it is out of memory, and no more memory could be made available by the garbage collector. OutOfMemoryError objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机由于内存不足而无法分配对象，并且垃圾回收器无法再提供更多内存时，抛出该异常。虚拟机可以构造 OutOfMemoryError 对象，就像禁用抑制和/或堆栈跟踪不可写一样。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine cannot allocate an object because it is out of memory, and no more memory could be made available by the garbage collector. OutOfMemoryError objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机由于内存不足而无法分配对象，并且垃圾回收器无法再提供更多内存时，抛出该异常。虚拟机可以构造 OutOfMemoryError 对象，就像禁用抑制和/或堆栈跟踪不可写一样。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Java Virtual Machine detects a circularity in the superclass hierarchy of a class being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当Java虚拟机检测到正在加载的类的超类层次中存在循环现象时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the Serialization runtime detects one of the following problems with a Class.
trans-unit.target: 当序列化运行时检测到Class出现下列问题之一时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the annotation parser attempts to read an annotation from a class file and determines that the annotation is malformed.
trans-unit.target: 当注解解析器试图从类文件中读取注解并确定注解是错误的时,抛出该函数。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the annotation parser attempts to read an annotation from a class file and determines that the annotation is malformed. This error can be thrown by the API used to read annotations reflectively.
trans-unit.target: 注释解析器尝试从类文件读取注释并确定注释格式错误时抛出。用于反射性读取注释的API可能引发此错误。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the opening handshake has failed.
trans-unit.target: 当开局握手失败时抛出。

trans-unit.source: Throws UnsupportedOperationException
trans-unit.target: 引发UnsupportedOperationException

trans-unit.source: Throws UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 CloneNotSupportedException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException. A Reference cannot be meaningfully cloned. Construct a new Reference instead.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 CloneNotSupportedException 。一个 Reference 无法进行有意义的克隆。而是构造一个新的 Reference 。

trans-unit.source: Throws IllegalArgumentException because "de-*-DE" is not a valid basic language range.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 IllegalArgumentException ,因为 "de-*-DE" 不是有效的基本语言范围。

trans-unit.source: Throws NoSuchMethodError.
trans-unit.target: 引发 NoSuchMethodError 。

trans-unit.source: Throws CannotRedoException if canRedo returns false.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 CannotRedoException 如果 canRedo 返回false。

trans-unit.source: Throws CannotRedoException if canRedo returns false. Sets hasBeenDone to true. Subclasses should override to redo the operation represented by this edit. Override should begin with a call to super.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 CannotRedoException 如果 canRedo 返回false。将 hasBeenDone 设置为 true 。子类应重写以重做此编辑表示的操作。覆盖应该从对super的调用开始。

trans-unit.source: Throws CannotUndoException if canUndo returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果 canUndo 返回 false ,则抛出 CannotUndoException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws CannotUndoException if canUndo returns false. Sets hasBeenDone to false. Subclasses should override to undo the operation represented by this edit. Override should begin with a call to super.
trans-unit.target: 如果 canUndo 返回 false ,则抛出 CannotUndoException 。将 hasBeenDone 设置为 false 。子类应重写以撤消此编辑表示的操作。覆盖应该从对super的调用开始。

trans-unit.source: Throws UnsupportedOperationException because ReadLocks do not support conditions.
trans-unit.target: 抛出 UnsupportedOperationException ,因为 ReadLocks 不支持条件。

trans-unit.source: Throws UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 引发 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws UnsupportedOperationException. Setting seeds in this generator is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 引发 UnsupportedOperationException 。不支持在此生成器中设置种子。

trans-unit.source: Throws CatalogException if there is no match.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配,则抛出CatalogException。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException as a Thread can not be meaningfully cloned.
trans-unit.target: 抛出CloneNotSupportedException,因为一个线程不能被有意义地克隆。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException as a Thread can not be meaningfully cloned. Construct a new Thread instead.
trans-unit.target: 抛出CloneNotSupportedException,因为一个线程不能被有意义地克隆。构造一个新的线程来代替。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException.
trans-unit.target: 抛出CloneNotSupportedException。

trans-unit.source: Throws CloneNotSupportedException. This guarantees that enums are never cloned, which is necessary to preserve their "singleton" status.
trans-unit.target: 抛出CloneNotSupportedException。这保证了枚举永远不会被克隆,这对于保持它们的 "单人 "状态是必要的。

trans-unit.source: Throws SocketException if the option is unrecognized, the socket is closed, or some low-level error occurred
trans-unit.target: 如果选项未被识别、套接字被关闭或发生一些低级错误,则抛出SocketException。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access members.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问成员，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access or modify the system properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问或修改系统属性，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access the AWT event queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问AWT事件队列，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access the package specified by the argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问参数指定的包，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access the specified package.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问指定的程序包，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access the system clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程访问系统剪贴板，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to access the system property with the specified key name.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程使用指定的 key 名访问系统属性，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to cause the Java Virtual Machine to halt with the specified status code.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程导致Java虚拟机以指定的状态代码暂停，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to create a new class loader.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程创建新的类加载器，则抛出 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to create a subprocess.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程创建子进程，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to define classes in the package specified by the argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程在参数指定的包中定义类，则抛出 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to define classes in the specified package.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程在指定的程序包中定义类，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to delete the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程删除指定的文件，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to dynamic link the library code specified by the string argument file.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程动态链接由字符串参数文件指定的库代码，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to dynamic link the library code specified by the string argument file. The argument is either a simple library name or a complete filename.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程动态链接由字符串参数文件指定的库代码，则引发 SecurityException 。参数是简单的库名或完整的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to initiate a print job request.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程发起打印作业请求，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to modify the thread argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程修改线程参数，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to modify the thread group argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程修改线程组参数，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to open a socket connection to the specified host and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程打开与指定主机和端口号的套接字连接，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to read from the specified file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程从指定的文件描述符中读取，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to read the file specified by the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程读取字符串参数指定的文件，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to set the socket factory used by ServerSocket or Socket, or the stream handler factory used by URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程设置 ServerSocket 或 Socket 使用的套接字工厂，或 URL 使用的流处理程序工厂，则抛出 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to use (join/leave/send/receive) IP multicast.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程使用（加入/离开/发送/接收）IP多播，则抛出 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to wait for a connection request on the specified local port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程在指定的本地端口号上等待连接请求，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to write to the file specified by the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程写入字符串参数指定的文件，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not allowed to write to the specified file descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程写入指定的文件描述符，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the calling thread is not permitted to accept a socket connection from the specified host and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许调用线程接受来自指定主机和端口号的套接字连接，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the requested access, specified by the given permission, is not permitted based on the security policy currently in effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果基于当前有效的安全策略不允许给定权限指定的请求的访问权限，则抛出 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the specified security context is denied access to the resource specified by the given permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的安全上下文被拒绝访问由给定权限指定的资源，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the specified security context is denied access to the resource specified by the given permission. The context must be a security context returned by a previous call to getSecurityContext and the access control decision is based upon the configured security policy for that security context.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的安全上下文被拒绝访问由给定权限指定的资源，则引发 SecurityException 。该上下文必须是先前对 getSecurityContext 的调用返回的安全上下文，并且访问控制决策基于为该安全上下文配置的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the specified security context is not allowed to open a socket connection to the specified host and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许指定的安全上下文打开到指定主机和端口号的套接字连接，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the specified security context is not allowed to read the file specified by the string argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许指定的安全上下文读取字符串参数指定的文件，则引发 SecurityException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws a SecurityException if the specified security context is not allowed to read the file specified by the string argument. The context must be a security context returned by a previous call to getSecurityContext.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许指定的安全上下文读取字符串参数指定的文件，则引发 SecurityException 。上下文必须是先前对 getSecurityContext 的调用返回的安全上下文。

trans-unit.source: Throws an IOException if the stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果流已关闭，则抛出 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: Throws an IOException if the stream has been closed. Subclasses may call this method from any of their methods that require the stream not to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果流已关闭，则抛出 IOException 。子类可以从不需要关闭流的任何方法中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Throws an AWTError, since a Box can use only a BoxLayout.
trans-unit.target: 抛出一个AWTError,因为一个Box只能使用一个BoxLayout。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception appropriate to the result described by this object.
trans-unit.target: 抛出与该对象描述的结果相应的异常。

trans-unit.source: Throws exception
trans-unit.target: 抛出异常

trans-unit.source: Throws:
trans-unit.target: Throws:

trans-unit.source: ThrowsTree
trans-unit.target: ThrowsTree

trans-unit.source: Ths default is "sticky", being a part of the static state of all URLConnections. This flag applies to the next, and all following URLConnections that are created.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 "sticky",是所有URLConnections静态状态的一部分。这个标志适用于下一个,以及所有后续创建的URLConnections。

trans-unit.source: Thumb color
trans-unit.target: 拇指颜色

trans-unit.source: Thumb dark shadow color
trans-unit.target: 拇指暗影色

trans-unit.source: Thumb highlight color
trans-unit.target: 拇指高光颜色

trans-unit.source: Thumb light shadow color
trans-unit.target: 拇指光影颜色

trans-unit.source: Thumb of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的拇指。

trans-unit.source: Thumb of the ScrollBar. The thumb is the region of the ScrollBar that gives a graphical depiction of what percentage of the View is currently visible. To bind a style to this Region use the name ScrollBarThumb.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的缩略图。滑块是ScrollBar的区域，它以图形方式描述了当前可见的View百分比。要将样式绑定到此 Region ,请使用名称 ScrollBarThumb 。

trans-unit.source: Thumb of the Slider.
trans-unit.target: 拇指的滑块。

trans-unit.source: Thumb of the Slider. The thumb of the Slider identifies the current value. To bind a style to this Region use the name SliderThumb.
trans-unit.target: 滑块的拇指。滑块的拇指可标识当前值。要将样式绑定到此 Region ,请使用名称 SliderThumb 。

trans-unit.source: Thumb rectangle

trans-unit.source: Thus for a class such as "sun.xyz.OurButton" we would first look for a BeanInfo class called "sun.xyz.OurButtonBeanInfo" and if that failed we'd look in each package in the BeanInfo search path for an OurButtonBeanInfo class. trans-unit.target: 因此,对于诸如 "sun.xyz.OurButton "这样的类,我们将首先查找名为 "sun.xyz.OurButtonBeanInfo "的 BeanInfo 类,如果查找失败,我们将在 BeanInfo 搜索路径中的每个包中查找 OurButtonBeanInfo 类。在默认的搜索路径下,这意味着要查找 "sun.beans.infos.OurButtonBeanInfo"。

trans-unit.source: Thus for example a pattern of "%t/java%g.log" with a count of 2 would typically cause log files to be written on Solaris to /var/tmp/java0.log and /var/tmp/java1.log whereas on Windows 95 they would be typically written to C:\TEMP\java0.log and C:\TEMP\java1.log
trans-unit.target: 因此,例如"%t/java%g.log "的模式,计数为2,通常会导致Solaris上的日志文件被写入/var/tmp/java0.log和/var/tmp/java1.log,而在Windows 95上,它们通常会被写入C:\TEMP/java0.log和C:\TEMP/java1.log。

trans-unit.source: Thus if the argument name is "fred", it will assume that there is an indexed reader method "getFred", a non-indexed (array) reader method also called "getFred", an indexed writer method "setFred", and finally a non-indexed writer method "setFred".
trans-unit.target: 因此,如果参数名是 "fred",它将假设有一个索引读取器方法 "getFred",一个非索引(数组)读取器方法也叫 "getFred",一个索引写入器方法 "setFred",最后一个非索引写入器方法 "setFred"。

trans-unit.source: Thus, byte values between 0x00 and 0x7f are simply returned as integer values between 0 and 127. Values between 0x80 and 0xff, which normally represent negative byte values, will be mapped into positive integers between 128 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 因此，简单地将 0x00 和 0x7f 之间的字节值作为 0 和 127 之间的整数值返回。通常表示负 byte 值的 0x80 和 0xff 之间的值将映射为 128 和 255 之间的正整数。

trans-unit.source: Thus, for any given local date-time there can be zero, one or two valid offsets. This method returns that list of valid offsets, which is a list of size 0, 1 or 2. In the case where there are two offsets, the earlier offset is returned at index 0 and the later offset at index 1.
trans-unit.target: 因此,对于任何给定的本地日期-时间,可以有0、1或2个有效的偏移量。这个方法返回有效偏移量的列表,它是一个大小为0、1或2的列表。在有两个偏移的情况下,较早的偏移被返回到索引0,较晚的偏移被返回到索引1。

trans-unit.source: Thus, for any given local date-time there can be zero, one or two valid offsets. This method returns the single offset in the Normal case, and in the Gap or Overlap case it returns the offset before the transition.
trans-unit.target: 因此,对于任何给定的本地日期-时间,可以有零、一或两个有效的偏移量。在正常情况下,本方法返回单个偏移量,在间隙或重叠情况下,本方法返回过渡前的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Thus, when a Locale object contains Unicode locale attributes and keywords, getExtension(UNICODE_LOCALE_EXTENSION) will return a String representing this information, for example, "nu-thai". The Locale class also provides getUnicodeLocaleAttributes(), getUnicodeLocaleKeys(), and getUnicodeLocaleType(java.lang.String) which allow you to access Unicode locale attributes and key/type pairs directly. When represented as a string, the Unicode Locale Extension lists attributes alphabetically, followed by key/type sequences with keys listed alphabetically (the order of subtags comprising a key's type is fixed when the type is defined)
trans-unit.target: 因此，当 Locale 对象包含Unicode语言环境属性和关键字时， getExtension(UNICODE_LOCALE_EXTENSION) 将返回表示此信息的字符串，例如“ nu-thai”。的 Locale 类还提供 getUnicodeLocaleAttributes() ， getUnicodeLocaleKeys() ,和 getUnicodeLocaleType(java.lang.String) ，其允许直接访问Unicode语言环境的属性和关键/类型对。当用字符串表示时，Unicode语言环境扩展按字母顺序列出属性，然后是按字母顺序列出键的键/类型序列（定义键类型时，包含键类型的子标签的顺序是固定的）

trans-unit.source: Thus, when a Locale object contains Unicode locale attributes and keywords, getExtension(UNICODE_LOCALE_EXTENSION) will return a String representing this information, for example, "nu-thai". The Locale class also provides getUnicodeLocaleAttributes(), getUnicodeLocaleKeys(), and getUnicodeLocaleType(java.lang.String) which allow you to access Unicode locale attributes and key/type pairs directly. When represented as a string, the Unicode Locale Extension lists attributes alphabetically, followed by key/type sequences with keys listed alphabetically (the order of subtags comprising a key's type is fixed when the type is defined)
trans-unit.target: 因此，当 Locale 对象包含Unicode语言环境属性和关键字时， getExtension(UNICODE_LOCALE_EXTENSION) 将返回表示此信息的字符串，例如“ nu-thai”。的 Locale 类还提供 getUnicodeLocaleAttributes() ， getUnicodeLocaleKeys() ,和 getUnicodeLocaleType(java.lang.String) ，其允许直接访问Unicode语言环境的属性和关键/类型对。当用字符串表示时，Unicode语言环境扩展按字母顺序列出属性，然后是键/类型序列以及按字母顺序列出的键（定义键类型时，包含键类型的子标签的顺序是固定的）

trans-unit.source: Thus, when copying an integral type source to an integral type destination, if the source sample size is greater than the destination sample size for a particular band, the high order bits of the source sample are truncated. If the source sample size is less than the destination size for a particular band, the high order bits of the destination are zero-extended or sign-extended depending on whether srcRaster's SampleModel treats the sample as a signed or unsigned quantity.
trans-unit.target: 因此,当把积分类型源复制到积分类型目标时,如果源样本大小大于目标样本大小,则源样本的高阶位会被截断。如果源样本大小小于特定频段的目标样本大小,目标样本的高阶位将被零扩展或符号扩展,这取决于srcRaster的SampleModel是将样本视为有符号还是无符号的数量。

trans-unit.source: Time units operate on the instant time-line. The calculation effectively converts both zoned date-times to instants and then calculates the period between the instants. For example, the period from noon on day 1 to noon the following day in hours may be 23, 24 or 25 hours (or some other amount) depending on whether there was a daylight savings change or not.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位在瞬间时间线上运行。计算有效地将两个分区日期时间转换为瞬时,然后计算两个瞬时之间的时间。例如,从第1天中午到第二天中午的小时数可能是23、24或25小时(或其他数量),这取决于是否有夏令时的变化。

trans-unit.source: Time units operate on the instant time-line. The period is first added to the local date-time, then converted back to a zoned date-time using the zone ID. The conversion uses ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) with the offset before the addition.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位在即时时间线上运行。该时间段首先添加到本地日期时间，然后使用区域ID转换回分区的日期时间。转换使用 ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) 加上加法运算前的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time units operate on the instant time-line. The period is first added to the local date-time, then converted back to a zoned date-time using the zone ID. The conversion uses ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) with the offset before the addition.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位在即时时间线上运行。该时间段首先添加到本地日期时间，然后使用区域ID转换回分区的日期时间。转换使用 ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) 加上相加前的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time units operate on the instant time-line. The period is first subtracted from the local date-time, then converted back to a zoned date-time using the zone ID. The conversion uses ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) with the offset before the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位在即时时间线上运行。该时间段首先从本地日期时间中减去，然后使用区域ID转换回分区的日期时间。转换使用 ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) 加上减法之前的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time units operate on the instant time-line. The period is first subtracted from the local date-time, then converted back to a zoned date-time using the zone ID. The conversion uses ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) with the offset before the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 时间单位在即时时间线上运行。该时间段首先从本地日期时间中减去，然后使用区域ID转换回分区的日期时间。转换使用 ofInstant(LocalDateTime, ZoneOffset, ZoneId) 加上减法之前的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time-zone rules are defined by governments and change frequently. There are a number of organizations, known here as groups, that monitor time-zone changes and collate them. The default group is the IANA Time Zone Database (TZDB). Other organizations include IATA (the airline industry body) and Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: 时区规则是由各国政府确定的,而且经常变化。有一些组织,在这里被称为组,监测时区变化并进行整理。默认组是IANA时区数据库(TZDB)。其他组织包括IATA(航空业机构)和微软。

trans-unit.source: Time-zone rules are political, thus the data can change at any time. Each provider will provide the latest rules for each zone ID, but they may also provide the history of how the rules changed.
trans-unit.target: 时区规则是政治性的,因此数据可能随时改变。每个提供商将提供每个区号的最新规则,但他们也可能提供规则变化的历史。

trans-unit.source: Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every local date-time is valid for the specified zone, thus the local date-time may not be midnight.
trans-unit.target: 时区规则,如夏令时,意味着并非每个本地日期时间都对指定区域有效,因此本地日期时间可能不是午夜。

trans-unit.source: Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every time on the local time-line exists. If the local date-time is in a gap or overlap according to the rules then a resolver is used to determine the resultant local time and offset. This method uses ZonedDateTime.ofLocal(LocalDateTime, ZoneId, ZoneOffset) to retain the offset from this instance if possible.
trans-unit.target: 夏时制等时区规则意味着，并非本地时间轴上的每个时间都存在。如果本地日期时间根据规则存在间隔或重叠，则使用解析器确定最终的本地时间和偏移量。如果可能 ZonedDateTime.ofLocal(LocalDateTime, ZoneId, ZoneOffset) 此方法使用ZonedDateTime.ofLocal（LocalDateTime，ZoneId，ZoneOffset）保留与此实例的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time-zone rules, such as daylight savings, mean that not every time on the local time-line exists. If the local date-time is in a gap or overlap according to the rules then a resolver is used to determine the resultant local time and offset. This method uses ZonedDateTime.ofLocal(LocalDateTime, ZoneId, ZoneOffset) to retain the offset from this instance if possible.
trans-unit.target: 夏时制等时区规则意味着，并非本地时间轴上的每个时间都存在。如果本地日期时间根据规则存在间隔或重叠，则使用解析器确定结果本地时间和偏移量。如果可能 ZonedDateTime.ofLocal(LocalDateTime, ZoneId, ZoneOffset) 此方法使用ZonedDateTime.ofLocal（LocalDateTime，ZoneId，ZoneOffset）保留与此实例的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Time-zones are defined by governments and change frequently. This method allows applications to find the history of changes to the rules for a single zone ID. The map is keyed by a string, which is the version string associated with the rules.
trans-unit.target: 时区是由政府定义的,经常变化。这种方法允许应用程序查找单个时区 ID 的规则变化历史。该地图由一个字符串键入,该字符串是与规则相关联的版本字符串。

trans-unit.source: To "run" as a particular Principal, code invokes the Subject.doAs(subject, ...) method. After invoking that method, the code runs as all the Principals associated with the specified Subject. Note that this Policy (and the Permissions granted in this Policy) only become effective after the call to Subject.doAs has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 若要“运行”为特定的 Principal ，代码将调用 Subject.doAs(subject, ...) 方法。调用该方法后，代码将作为与指定 Subject 关联的所有Principal运行。请注意，此 Policy （在此授予权限 Policy 调用后）才能生效 Subject.doAs 发生。

trans-unit.source: To a user of your program, however, both of these sequences should be treated as the same "user-level" character "A with acute accent". When you are searching or comparing text, you must ensure that these two sequences are treated as equivalent. In addition, you must handle characters with more than one accent. Sometimes the order of a character's combining accents is significant, while in other cases accent sequences in different orders are really equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 然而,对于程序的用户来说,这两个序列应该被视为相同的 "用户级 "字符 "A with acute accent"。当您搜索或比较文本时,您必须确保这两个序列被视为等价的。此外,您还必须处理具有一个以上重音的字符。有时,一个字符的组合重音的顺序很重要,而在其他情况下,不同顺序的重音序列实际上是相等的。

trans-unit.source: To achieve laziness the actual work of locating and instantiating providers is done by the iterator itself. Its hasNext and next methods can therefore throw a ServiceConfigurationError for any of the reasons specified in the Errors section above. To write robust code it is only necessary to catch ServiceConfigurationError when using the iterator. If an error is thrown then subsequent invocations of the iterator will make a best effort to locate and instantiate the next available provider, but in general such recovery cannot be guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现懒惰，定位和实例化提供程序的实际工作是由迭代器本身完成的。因此，由于上面“错误”部分中指定的任何原因，其 hasNext 和 next 方法可以引发 ServiceConfigurationError 。要编写健壮的代码，只需要在使用迭代器时捕获 ServiceConfigurationError 即可。如果抛出错误，则迭代器的后续调用将尽最大努力查找并实例化下一个可用的提供程序，但通常不能保证这种恢复。

trans-unit.source: To achieve laziness the actual work of locating providers is done when processing the stream. If a service provider cannot be loaded for any of the reasons specified in the Errors section above then ServiceConfigurationError is thrown by whatever method caused the service provider to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 为了懒惰，在处理流时会完成查找提供者的实际工作。如果由于上述“错误”部分中指定的任何原因而无法加载服务提供者，则将导致导致加载服务提供者的任何方法均引发 ServiceConfigurationError 。

trans-unit.source: To achieve laziness the actual work of parsing the available provider-configuration files and instantiating providers must be done by the iterator itself. Its hasNext and next methods can therefore throw a ServiceConfigurationError if a provider-configuration file violates the specified format, or if it names a provider class that cannot be found and instantiated, or if the result of instantiating the class is not assignable to the service type, or if any other kind of exception or error is thrown as the next provider is located and instantiated. To write robust code it is only necessary to catch ServiceConfigurationError when using a service iterator.
trans-unit.target: 为了懒惰，解析可用的提供程序配置文件和实例化提供程序的实际工作必须由迭代器本身完成。因此，如果提供者配置文件违反指定的格式，或者如果它命名了无法找到和实例化的提供者类，或者实例化类的结果无法分配给服务类型，则其 hasNext 和 next 方法会引发 ServiceConfigurationError 。，或者在定位并实例化下一个提供程序时引发任何其他类型的异常或错误。要编写健壮的代码，只需要在使用服务迭代器时捕获 ServiceConfigurationError 即可。
